Key Arguments: The submission argues that there is no evidence supporting the claim that misinformation and disinformation are threats to the safety, wellbeing, democracy, society, and economy of Australians.
The submission emphasizes support for free speech and opposition to the proposed legislation.
Main Themes: Lack of evidence for claims about misinformation and disinformation
Notable Quotes: "I see no evidence in support of this and I am therefore very much against the proposed new bill."
"I support free speech and oppose this legislation."
